description:
Search amongst 12,000 campgrounds and RV parks across North America with the 2011 edition Woodall’s RV & Camping Copilot, to find your next perfect camping spot.  Rest assured you’re going to find the ideal place to camp, with our detailed listing information and trusted 5W/5W facilities and recreation ratings. Woodall’s is the most reliable source of RV park and campground info, and has published the leading annual Campground Directory in print for 75 years! Here’s what’s included in our mobile app, created for iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch:

-          Search by city and state or province, or search nearby
-          Detailed results of over 12,000 campgrounds and RV parks across North America, reflected on a map view and in listed results
-          Woodall’s signature 5W/5W facilities and recreation campground ratings
-          Detailed amenities, services and recreation at parks
-          Over 1,000 popular attractions pin pointed on the map view
-          Ideal for the active RVer, family camper or tent camper

Woodall’s has 28 rep teams actively evaluating campgrounds each year, so that you know you’ll always have the most reliable and up-to-date information available, right in the palm of your hand.  Plus, as a bonus, enjoy photos of some parks and links to their websites. All campgrounds include one-touch click to call functionality, which make contacting a park easy and quick.  Woodall’s is the Official Directory of Camping World and part of the Good Sam Family.
releaseNotes:
* iOS 6 ready
* Additional enhancements 
* Bug fixes
